0.text: Innate: Periodically, Ziggs empowers his next basic attack to deal 20 − 160 (based on level) (+ 50% AP) bonus magic damage,「 increased by 150% against structures. 」「 increased to 50 − 400 (based on level) (+ 125% AP) against structures. 」
0.html: Innate: Periodically, Ziggs empowers his next basic attack to deal 20 − 160 (based on level) (+ 50% AP) bonus magic damage,「 increased by 150% against structures. 」「 increased to 50 − 400 (based on level) (+ 125% AP) against structures. 」

1.text: Short Fuse's cooldown is  reduced by 4 / 5 / 6 (based on level) seconds whenever Ziggs casts an ability.
1.html: Short Fuse's cooldown is  reduced by 4 / 5 / 6 (based on level) seconds whenever Ziggs casts an ability.

0.text: Active: Ziggs throws a bomb to the target location that bounces forward up to two times, the distance traveled each time being based on how far it was originally thrown.
0.html: Active: Ziggs throws a bomb to the target location that bounces forward up to two times, the distance traveled each time being based on how far it was originally thrown.

1.text: The bomb explodes upon landing near an enemy, within terrain, or the final bounce, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.
1.html: The bomb explodes upon landing near an enemy, within terrain, or the final bounce, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies.

2.text: Bouncing Bomb will cast at max range if cast beyond that.
2.html: Bouncing Bomb will cast at max range if cast beyond that.

0.text: Active: Ziggs hurls a charge to the target location, remaining there for 4 seconds and granting  sight of the area. Satchel Charge can be recast within the duration, and does so automatically afterwards. If recast while in flight, the charge will explode immediately upon landing.
0.html: Active: Ziggs hurls a charge to the target location, remaining there for 4 seconds and granting sight of the area. Satchel Charge can be recast within the duration, and does so automatically afterwards. If recast while in flight, the charge will explode immediately upon landing.

1.text: Recast: The charge explodes to deal magic damage to nearby enemies and  knock them back up to 500 units away from the center of the explosion, though not through terrain. If this hits Ziggs, he will  dash up to 825 units away from the center.
1.html: Recast: The charge explodes to deal magic damage to nearby enemies and knock them back up to 500 units away from the center of the explosion, though not through terrain. If this hits Ziggs, he will dash up to 825 units away from the center.

2.text: Turret Explosion: The explosion also   executes enemy  turrets within that are below a maximum health threshold.
2.html: Turret Explosion: The explosion also executes enemy turrets within that are below a maximum health threshold.

3.text: Ziggs does not  dash if he is  immobilized or  grounded. He can cast any of his abilities during the dash.
3.html: Ziggs does not dash if he is immobilized or grounded. He can cast any of his abilities during the dash.

0.text: Active: Ziggs scatters a cluster of 11 proximity mines over the target location that grant  sight of the area for 2 seconds, arming after 0.5 seconds and lasting for up to 10 seconds.
0.html: Active: Ziggs scatters a cluster of 11 proximity mines over the target location that grant sight of the area for 2 seconds, arming after 0.5 seconds and lasting for up to 10 seconds.

1.text: Each mine within the area explodes upon contact with terrain or an enemy, dealing magic damage and  slowing them for 1.5 seconds, as well as granting  sight of the area around the explosion for 2 seconds. An enemy takes 40% damage from subsequent mines.
1.html: Each mine within the area explodes upon contact with terrain or an enemy, dealing magic damage and slowing them for 1.5 seconds, as well as granting sight of the area around the explosion for 2 seconds. An enemy takes 40% damage from subsequent mines.

0.text: Active: Ziggs catapults the Mega Inferno Bomb to the target location, granting  sight within a 600 radius around its destination for 4 seconds.
0.html: Active: Ziggs catapults the Mega Inferno Bomb to the target location, granting sight within a 600 radius around its destination for 4 seconds.

1.text: The bomb explodes upon arrival to deal magic damage to enemies hit, increased by 50% against those in the epicenter.
1.html: The bomb explodes upon arrival to deal magic damage to enemies hit, increased by 50% against those in the epicenter.

Active

Unique – Trinket: Consume a charge to place an invisible Totem Ward at the target location, which grants sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).
consume.originText: UNIQUE – TRINKET: Consume a charge to place an invisible  Totem Ward at the target location, which grants  sight of the surrounding area for 90 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds (240 − 120 (based on average of all champion levels) seconds recharge time; 2 charges; 600 range).

Stats

+15 ability power
+70 health

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Focus: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against minions.
Unique – Drain: Restore 1 mana every second, increased to 1.5 for 10 seconds when you damage an enemy champion. If you can't gain mana, heal 45% of this value instead.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – FOCUS: Basic attacks deal 5 bonus physical damage on-hit against  minions.

+80 ability power

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Torment: Dealing ability damage burns enemies, causing them to take「 50 (+ 6% AP) (+ 4% target's maximum health) total magic damage over 4 seconds, capped at 400 against monsters. 」「 6.25 (+ 0.75% AP) (+ 0.5% target's maximum health) magic damage every 0.5 seconds over 4 seconds, capped at 50 against monsters. 」
Unique – Agony: Deal 0% − 12% (based on target's bonus health) bonus magic damage against enemy champions.
Mythic Passive: Empowers each of your other Legendary items with 5 ability haste.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – TORMENT: Dealing ability damage burns enemies, causing them to take「 50 (+ 6% AP) (+ 4% target's maximum health) total magic damage over 4 seconds, capped at 400 against monsters. 」

stats.originHTML:
Stats

+60 ability power
+200 health
+500 mana

passive.originHTML:
Passive

Unique – Awe: Grants ability haste equal to 0.5% bonus mana.
Unique – Mana Charge: Grants a charge every 8 seconds, up to 4 charges. Affecting an enemy or ally with an ability consumes a charge and grants 3 bonus mana, increased to 6 if it's a champion, up to a maximum of 360 bonus mana.
Transforms into Seraph's Embrace at +360 mana.
passive.originText: UNIQUE – AWE: Grants ability haste equal to 0.5% bonus mana.
